item.description:
Psychic Holistic Arts Faire is a fund raiser for Cancer


Plan on meeting with Barbara for Lunch at Noon!
(I won't be able to attend, but you'll be in good hands with Barbara!)

Lunch provided by the Son’s of Italy from Noon to 4:30 pm for $6.00
Choice of chicken, tuna, egg salad or Hummus on a sub roll, with chips and a fountain soda

They have internationally known psychics, mediums, Tarot, Numerologists, Spirit drawings, Crystal ball, Animal communication (bring photo of your favorite pet), Angel readings, Astrologers, & Teal Leaf readings.

All readings are $20 for 15 minutes

Browse & Shop with a wide selection of vendors:

Raffle, Arts, crafts, crystals & gems, jewelry, candles, music, Aura Photos, Books, enchanting gifts. Holistic and Wellness products.

Members of the local Holistic community will be on site offering their expertise in Reiki, Reflexology, Massage…

Cash Bar

Don’t miss out on this Fabulous Day of Fun and Magic!
item.how_to_find_us: Barbara will meet you in the lobby. She will have a pin with her name on it!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Psychic Holistic Arts Faire at the Sons of Italy in Cotuit
